Question.Subject: How do you reblog conversations with other people on Tumblr, or just reblogging something and adding a comment?
Question.Content:
Where am I suppose to type my comments? For example, When I try to reply/reblog conversations with my friends, my comments don't show up when she reblogs them... Sorry if it sounds confusing. Am I suppose to put it after, before the

, or another place?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
REblog? As if blogging alone isn't bad enough. Like regifting, lmao.

is for paragraphing. http://www.tedmontgomery.com/tutorial/text.html#paragraph

Answer.Content:
REblog? As if blogging alone isn't bad enough. Like regifting, lmao.
